bibl.title: Greek Constitutions of Early Roman Emperors from Inscriptions and Papyri.

series.title: Memoirs of the American Philosophical Society.

bibl.note: Introduction. - Epistles, Edicts, Rescripts, and Instructions. - Speeches. - Documents from Josephus and the Corpus Iuris. - Concordance. - Index of Emperors and their Relatives.
bibl.seg: Oliver James H., Greek Constitutions of Early Roman Emperors from Inscriptions and Papyri. (Memoirs of the American Philosophical Society. 178.)
Philadelphia, American Philosophical Society, 1989, 8°, xxxv-634 pp., 20 pll.
Introduction. - Epistles, Edicts, Rescripts, and Instructions. - Speeches. - Documents from Josephus and the Corpus Iuris. - Concordance. - Index of Emperors and their Relatives.

C.R. par Klaus Hallof, Klio 74 (1992) p. 521. - C.P. Jones, AJP 113 (1992) pp. 144-147. - J. Linderski, CW 84 (1990-1991) p. 499. - Alain Martin, Hermathena 150 (1991) pp. 66-68. - Georg Petzl, Gnomon 64 (1992) pp. 613-618. - Jean A. Straus, EtCl 60 (1992) p. 383. - Alan K. Bowman, CR N.S., 43 (1993) pp. 406-408. - G.P. Burton, JRA 5 (1992) pp. 431-433. - Peter Herrmann, HZ 254 (1992) pp. 700-702. - Jean-Pierre Martin, AntCl 61 (1992) pp. 601-602. - Edgar Pack, Gymnasium 98 (1991) pp. 564-566. - Édouard Will, RPhil 3e s., 65 (1991) pp. 39-41. - Ingomar Weiler, AnzAW 45 (1992) coll. 241-243.
